or receptor-associated periodic syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome ?,"TRAPS is caused by mutations in the TNFRSF1A gene. This gene provides instructions for making a protein called tumor necrosis factor receptor 1 (TNFR1). This protein is found within the membrane of cells, where it attaches (binds) to another protein called tumor necrosis factor (TNF).
